data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Séret, Bernard, Shao, Kwang-Tsao (2009): Redescription of Lophiodes infrabrunneus Smith and Radcliffe, 1912, a senior synonym of L. abdituspinus Ni, Wu and Li, 1990 (Lophiiformes: Lophiidae). Zootaxa 2326: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.192090
